meanings.sent1: Many misassumptions led to confusion in the project.
meanings.sent2: She realized her misassumptions about the situation after talking to her friend.
meanings.sent3: The misassumptions about the party location made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His misassumptions were like blindfolds, preventing him from seeing the truth.
meanings.sent5: The misassumptions hung over the room like a dark cloud, casting doubt on everything.

meanings.sent1: The misassumptions about magic were shattered when the trick was revealed.
meanings.sent2: His misassumptions about success held him back from trying new things.
meanings.sent3: The misassumptions about aliens visiting Earth made for an entertaining conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her misassumptions were like chains, binding her to a limited perspective.
meanings.sent5: The misassumptions whispered in his ear, leading him astray with their deceitful promises.
